telephony_group_line_cancel_terminate_ti: Cancel the termination of the "{{ line }}" line
telephony_group_line_cancel_terminate_in: This page allows you to cancel your request to terminate your line.
telephony_group_line_cancel_terminating_:
An error occurred while requesting the cancellation
{{error}}
telephony_group_line_cancel_terminate_ac:
You have a pending termination request for the line.
This termination is scheduled for {{executionDate}}.
By clicking the “Cancel termination” button, you will immediately cancel the termination.
